divinate.advice: Time for new Beginnings. Trust the Universe and step up!
Take some breath and try to realize your surroundings. It is possible you are being too naive.
Use the Idealism in the air at your favor, just do not exagerate or you may end up a bit lost.
You are dealing with the situation with Hability. Keep up the good work!
You are managing to get adapted to the situation quite well.
You are going very well, but don't be overconfident, or you may ruin what you got!
Occult matters are now being revealed. Read them wisely!
There are some higher misteries in the subject. But you are in position to access them.
There is mistery in the situation, but don't be too gripped to it, or you may end up in too much fantasy.
Pleasure and Fertility are on the matter. Enjoy the good times!
You are attracting good things, and giving birth to good new things!
You feel good, but don't be too self indulgent.
Stability governs the matter. Realization is on its way!
You have got the decision power over the matter. Lead the way!
Things are stable, but inflexible. Keep walking, but try to be a bit more relaxed.
Keep things the way the are traditionally done, and you will succeed!
Seek for formal orientation on the matter. Follow it, and you may succeed!
Don't be too intolerant with different values. This may cause things to became heavy for you.
It's a good time for partnerships, either in love or the area in question!
It's your time to chose. Choose wisely, and you will make a good harvest!
Choose quickly, as it seems you have some indecision which hinders you...
A good advance is happening right now around this matter!
Follow the flow as you are being taken to a great spot!
Getting there, but for some things there are no comming back!
The circumstances require you to be controlled, but you've got all you need!
You have the strength to overcome the challenges you are facing.
It's about time to domme this lion within you!
Get some time alone with your intuition, and you shall be enlightened!
Although it seems you're alone, it's just a time to touch the light.
Look towards the light, and it will soon end your loneliness!
The wind of change is blowing you forward!
Be prepared for changes soon. The balance will decide the results of it.
Take into account that things are going to be different owards.
Ballance is returning to the situation.
All things are being put on their places!
Be careful as the justice keeps everything in balance, even yourself.
It is a learning period you cannot run from.
Stop trying to fight against things you have no control over.
It is useless to try to escape the situation. Focus on something else.
Everything will transform from water to wine!
From now on, things will not be the same anynmore!
Prepare for a change which has no way back!
Things will cool down, and you will be able to feel the true vibes.
Don't ignore your emotions, but be realist at the same time.
Material and Emotional are getting aligned now.
Now it's the time to prioritize your own will over anyone's else, without being disrespectful.
Allow yourself to have some pleasure, but be careful not to harm others.
If too much, hold yourself a bit, in order not to run over anyone else's will.
Some things need first to be destroyed in order to form something far better.
It's a catarse process which will clean up your sphere from all non-working stuff.
The universe has set this time of difficulties, so you can transform into something better.
The Universe is on your side, and supports your decisions!
There are external forces helping you onwards!
All is helping, but be careful not to live in hope alone.
The light you see it is not true. It is reflecting something occult.
You are in a process to beat some illusions in your life.
Seek the true light, and all hidden lies will finally pop out.
Light shines upon you, rejoice and be happy!
Luck is on your side, just follow the light!
Everything will work fine, but too much light may leave one blind.
The truth around the situation is being clearly revealed to everyone.
It will become clear for you the results that sum up from what you've gone through.
Each part will receive a fair share of retribution for what has been happening.
Grab your reward, not only in material things, but in all the experience you got so far.
You have reached the goals set for you, and are ready for the next level!
The world is not at your feet, but do not be accomodate!
There's fire and passion in the air. Can you feel the attraction?
There's harmony and partnership in the matter.
New partnerships are available for you if you want.
Fertility and Creativity are currently abundant!
Time for Joy and Cellebration for the firstfruits!
Rejoice and Party, but don't go over somebody else's line!
Be careful not to focus only the negative points. You need motivation to advance!
Don't be ashamed of waiting a bit more until you are sure of your feelings.
It's no use to set your feelings on what gives you no pleasure. Motivate yourself to advance!
There's emotional deception. It's possible that you loose something you like.
Although you are feeling down, with reasons, there is yet hope for realization.
To overcome a loss is not easy. But seek for hope, and you'll win this battle!
There's emotional deception. It's possible that you loose something you like.
Although you are feeling down, with reasons, there is yet hope for realization.
To overcome a loss is not easy. But seek for hope, and you'll win this battle!
